heroSection.title1: Digital Menu for Ordering and Payment
heroSection.description: ENS provides you with the best digital menu solutions for restaurants and cafes through QR codes to receive orders and payments from your customers for a seamless and convenient experience, contributing to increasing customer satisfaction and boosting sales.
heroSection.subtitle: Transform your restaurant menu into a beautiful, easy-to-use digital experience
heroSection.trust: No Commissions • Fast Setup • Ongoing Technical Support

trustedBy.title: Trusted by Thousands of Restaurants and Hospitality Centers

whatsapp.title: Contact Us via WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Call us at 01xxxxxxxxx to get help

hero.title: Create Your Digital Menu
hero.subtitle: In Minutes
hero.description: Transform your restaurant menu into a beautiful, easy-to-use digital experience. No coding required.

features.title: Features of the Menu
features.description: ENS provides you with the best digital menu solutions for restaurants and cafes through QR codes to receive orders and payments from your customers for a seamless and convenient experience, contributing to increasing customer satisfaction and boosting sales.

items.title: Customize the Visual Identity
items.description: Design your digital identity by changing colors, logos, and covers, and link the digital menu to your social media accounts.

items.title: Advanced Reports and Analytics
items.description: Get precise data and reports to understand your business performance, identify opportunities for improvement and development.

items.title: Payment Processing
items.description: Receive orders and payments easily by linking the digital menu to the cashier system for a seamless and convenient experience.

items.title: Easy Dashboard
items.description: Manage orders, branches, and instant updates through a simple and flexible interface, with the ability to add users.

items.title: Independent Control of Each Branch
items.description: Control each branch individually, add and edit any products, and track sales easily.

items.title: Increase Profits
items.description: Reduce your reliance on costly delivery applications and receive orders through your own platform without commissions.

items.title: Technical Support 24/7
items.description: We provide continuous technical support to ensure you get help immediately whenever you need it.

items.title: Multi-Language Support
items.description: Translate the menu into multiple languages to serve all customers from different countries.

whyUs.title: Why Choose ENS?
items: Suitable for all restaurants and cafes
Simple and easy to use design

howItWorks.title: Steps to Create a Digital Menu with
howItWorks.description: Create a digital menu with easy and quick steps that reflects your restaurant's identity and simplifies the ordering and payment process for your customers.

steps.title: Choose the Package
steps.description: Create an account and choose the package that suits your needs from our diverse solutions.

steps.title: Add the Items
steps.description: Send your menu to our team, and we will design an interactive digital menu. You can add or delete any item at any time.

steps.title: Share and Receive Orders
steps.description: Share the menu with your customers and receive orders and payments easily and quickly.

pricing.title: Choose the Package
pricing.description: Choose the package that suits your restaurant from our smart solutions.

packages.name: Basic
features: Translation of the Menu into Multiple Languages

packages.name: Professional
features: All Features of the Basic Package
Order from the Table from the QR Code

contact.title1: Ready for a Quality Shift in
contact.description: Book your consultation with ENS now and create a digital menu that inspires your customers and boosts your sales.

cta.title: Are you ready to get started?
cta.description: Create your first menu in minutes. No credit card required.

footer.description: ENS provides you with the best digital menu solutions for restaurants and cafes through QR codes to receive orders and payments from your customers for a seamless and convenient experience, contributing to increasing customer satisfaction and boosting sales.
